name: inline
description: Post a message with inline wiki links.

options.name: text
options.description: Text including wikitext links.

name: verify
description: Verify your Discord account with your wiki account.

options.name: username
options.description: Your username on the wiki.

name: settings
description: Change the settings for the server.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to change the settings for.

options.name: wiki
options.description: The default wiki for the server or channel.

options.name: lang
options.description: The language for the server or, Patreon only, channel.

options.name: role
options.description: The minimal required role for the server or, Patreon only, channel.

options.name: inline
options.description: Should inline commands be enabled for the server or, Patreon only, channel?

options.name: prefix
options.description: Patreon only: The bot command prefix for the server.

name: verification
description: Change the verifications for the server.

options.name: id
options.description: The ID of the verification. Set to 0 to add a new verification.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel for the verification.

options.name: role
options.description: The role for the verification.

options.name: editcount
options.description: The edit count for the verification.

options.name: accountage
options.description: The wiki account age in days for the verification.

options.name: rename
options.description: Should the Discord user be renamed to their wiki username for the verification.

options.name: usergroup
options.description: The usergroup for the verification. Add multiple usergroups comma separated.

options.name: and
options.description: Should all provided usergroups be required for the verification, instead of just one of them?

options.name: postcount
options.description: The Fandom feeds post count for the verification.

options.name: posteditcount
options.description: How the Fandom feeds post count should relate to the edit count requirement for the verification.

choices.name: Require both edit and post count.
Require either edit or post count.
Require combined edit and post count.

name: rcscript
description: Change the recent changes webhooks for the server.

options.name: id
options.description: The ID of the recent changes webhook. Set to 0 to add a new recent changes webhook.

options.name: wiki
options.description: The wiki for the recent changes webhook.

options.name: lang
options.description: The language for the recent changes webhook.

options.name: display
options.description: The display mode for the recent changes webhook.

choices.name: Compact text messages with inline links.
Embed messages with edit tags and category changes.
Patreon only: Embed messages with image previews and edit differences.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel for the recent changes webhook.

options.name: feeds
options.description: Should Fandom feeds posts be send to the recent changes webhook?

options.name: feedsonly
options.description: Should only Fandom feeds enabled for the recent changes webhook? (MediaWiki changes disabled)
